info.description: RESTful API for Point of Sales (POS) system using Go, Fiber, and PostgreSQL. Includes inventory management, customer management, order processing, payments, and receipts.
info.title: JatiStore POS API

post.description: Change the current authenticated user's password
Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get the current authenticated user's profile

put.description: Update the current authenticated user's profile

get.description: Get all users in the system (admin only)
Get a specific user by ID (admin only)
Get a list of all categories

post.description: Create a new category with the provided data

get.description: Get a category by its unique identifier

put.description: Update a category with the provided data

delete.description: Delete a category by its ID

get.description: Get a list of all customers

post.description: Create a new customer with the provided information

get.description: Search customers by name, email, or phone
Get all orders for a specific customer
Get customer details by customer ID
Get a list of all inventory records

post.description: Create a new inventory record with the provided data

get.description: Get an inventory record by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an inventory record with the provided data

delete.description: Delete an inventory record by its ID

get.description: Get a list of all orders

post.description: Create a new sales order with items

get.description: Get order details by order ID

post.description: Process a payment for an order
Generate a receipt for a paid order

put.description: Update the status of an order

get.description: Get a list of all products

post.description: Create a new product with the provided data

get.description: Get a product by its unique identifier

put.description: Update a product with the provided data

delete.description: Delete a product by its ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
